talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Link! Where are you going?!


We can't just ignore those monsters.
I'm staying right here!
talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Link, that is not the direction of the
secret stone.
talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Hey! Where are you going? If you have
something else to do, I can fall back.
talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>I cannot afford to leave this place. We'll
meet up again when you return.
talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Determination_01>I have been awaiting your return. Come,
let us make our way to the secret stone.
talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>I'll remain here, so come back when
you can!
talk_45:
Please accompany this construct to the
secret stone's location.
talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey, uh, Link... <sp:5:0:0>Aren't we going away
from where Princess Zelda is?

If you've got something to do out this
way, I think I'll head back.
talk_46:
Until we obtain the secret stone, this
construct will be unable to travel with you.
talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hey, Link? This isn't the way to
the princess.

I'm gonna turn back, OK?
talk_47: I will wait here until you return.
talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Um, Link? <sp:5:0:0>Are you going somewhere?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'll keep up the search for Princess Zelda
on my own until you get back!
talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Determination_00>You're leaving now, Link? Really? Come
back as soon as you can, and let's finish
this monster!
talk_48:
Until we obtain the secret stone, my
construct cannot leave this place.
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>What is it, Link? Are you going
somewhere?

I've got to find <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>and save
the village from the blizzard. I'm not
gonna leave until that's done!
talk_49: I will remain here until your return.
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>You're really going? Be sure to come back
when you've done what you need to!
talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>I've been waiting for you. Now let's go
find Princess Zelda!
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Do you have to go somewhere, Link?


<sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll keep looking into whatever's going on
with <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> and the <clr:0000>blizzard<clr:ffff> while
you're away.
But soar back when you can!
talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>You're really leaving? I can't sit back and
let those monsters have their way.

I'm gonna stay here and keep fighting!
Just promise me you'll come back, OK?

I'll be waiting!
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Link! Do you have business elsewhere?<sp:5:0:0>
If so, then I shall head back until the
right moment is upon us!
talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Wait, <sp:5:0:0>you're leaving?<sp:5:0:0> Now?!


Well, that's fine. I'll stay here and handle
the monsters until you're back!

Just...come back soon, OK?
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:ShidoClench_00>I'm afraid I cannot leave this place.<sp:5:0:0> I shall
await your return, my friend!
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>You're back! Come on, we've got more
investigating to do!
talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>You came back! I knew you would!


Now we've got this. Come on, Link!
Let's fight these monsters together!
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Angry_01>Forgive me, Link, but I cannot leave
this place.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Do what you must, and meanwhile, I shall
eagerly await your return.
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Think_00>Link? Where are you going?


I'd follow you, but I don't want to go too
far from my bow...
talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TuliDepressed_00>Are you going?


I can't leave until I get my bow back...
but that's OK. I can wait for you!
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>At last! I have been waiting for you.
Come now, let us be off!
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Notice_00>Link? Are you ditching me?


The monster still has my bow... So I'll
stay here and wait for you to get back!
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>There you are. I've been waiting for you!


All right, now I'm really ready to go.
Time to take back my bow!
